subject: Re: [junit] hello friends
msgSnippet: hi friend, I am praveen working in WB Testing (java + junit) Refer the below site to know more about junit and its architecture http://www.junit.org/index.htm
messageBody:
hi friend,

I am praveen working in WB Testing (java + junit)

Refer the below site to know more about junit and its architecture
http://www.junit.org/index.htm

Refer the below site to know more about java
http://java.sun.com/

if you need any pdf or ppt related to junit just search in google
like (junit + pdf)


Thanks & regards
Praveen



thanga raju <thangaraju_mce@...> wrote:

hi friends,

This is thangaraju from Chennai. Iam working as a Software Test Engineer in Chennai.

I need some help from you guys and gals.

Iam assigned for Java based white box testing. I need to study both Java and Junit within 20 days time. Iam new to both Java and Junit.

Could anyone tell me how to prepare for that(java, junit and white box testing).

How much java knowledge should I need to work in this white box testing??

If u have any junit study material send it to me. Because iam new to Junit and Java.

And also try to get me the details about Junit. How to prepare for that. And how to test Java projects using Junit.

Hoping to hear from you soon.

Regards,

M.P.Thangaraju
